workflows.name: planning
workflows.description: Creates and saves structured plans using LLM

create_plan_prompt.template:
You are creating a plan. IMPORTANT INSTRUCTIONS:

1. Output ONLY the plain markdown plan
2. DO NOT include any meta-commentary
3. Start directly with '# Plan Title'

Create a plan with these sections:
1. Objectives
2. Key Steps
3. Timeline
4. Resources
5. Success Metrics

The task is: {task}{timeframe_text}{resources_text}

python_learning.template:
You are creating a Python learning plan. IMPORTANT INSTRUCTIONS:

1. Output ONLY the plain markdown learning plan
2. DO NOT include any meta-commentary
3. Start directly with '# Python Learning Plan'

Create a 3-month Python learning plan with these sections:
1. Week-by-week curriculum
2. Python libraries to learn
3. Coding projects
4. Learning resources
5. Progress metrics

The task is: {task}{timeframe_text}{resources_text}

workflows.name: evaluation
workflows.description: Evaluates the performance of the planning workflow
